item.description:
We'll be discussing Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's book, Purple Hibiscus.

New meetup location is Bruegger's Bagels in Coolidge Corner. (The Brookline public library charges $50 for each use of their rooms, so that's not an option.) To get to Bruegger's, take the Green line C to Coolidge Corner. From Beacon Street, if you're facing the direction of Cleveland Circle (outbound), turn left onto Harvard street. Bruegger's will be on your left, about half a block away from the T stop.
item.name: Reading books by international writers February meetup
